reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt gorgeous and soft. The zipper quality receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting the ugly silver zipper.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, generous sizing, good value!
items.body: What a wonderful surprise! I'd had a similar cashmere sweater with zipper that I bought at Nordstrom 20 years ago. I loved that sweater, but it had grown old and worn at the elbows and was starting to separate at the seams. When The Wirecutter posted about this one, I leapt at the chance to replace my old one, but I was worried the 1X size wouldn't fit me well as a plus-sized woman who usually wears about a size 20. Much to my surprise, this one fit great! And it's so soft and high quality that I'm sure I'm going to wear it as much as possible, even though I live in Phoenix and can only wear it for about 8 weeks out of the year, lol. Read more
items.author: daersay

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ugly unacceptable silver colored zipper.
items.body: Naadam is okay for general cashmere consumption. It's far from the best but certainly not the worst. I have this hoodie in another color - chocolatey brown. It has a black zipper which is appropriate. This black one has a big, ugly silver zipper that ruins the whole effect of a nice, drapey cashmere hoodie. Instead it gives it an industrial look. I returned it. Read more
items.author: customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft
items.body: This hoodie is georgious I lust love it. Read more
items.author: Michelle M Depezynski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and lovely
items.body: Absolutely beautiful. Comfortable yet dressy if needed! It has all the features of a cotton sweatshirt, in side and outer pockets and easy to use zipper. Obviously, I’m pleased with it. Read more
items.author: cjay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars to expensive
items.body: I definitely feel this is a very soft sweater. The zipper works easily. The quality of the fabric appears to be very well made. It is light weight and comfortable. It is warm but not for winter due to being to thin. I would suggest it as a crisp fall morning or later spring weather jacket. The style is casual because it does have a hood and hood strings. I do not think this is worth the ridiculously high cost however. I feel like there is a big store with a brand called stars above and this fabric and style are VERY SIMILAR and the price is better at the store. Read more
items.author: Wendi - aunties book club

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Oatmeal Cashmere Hoodie
items.body: Cashmere Hoodie Once you slip on this 100% cashmere, relaxed-fit zip-up hoodie, you will feel warm, comfortable, and spoiled. The drawstring hood is ideal for me since I always seem to get cold. The hoodie features a pair of kangaroo pockets, perfect for storing keys or a phone. You will appreciate that this has dual inner pockets deep enough to hold your keys or even your phone. With the holidays rapidly approaching, this will make a fantastic gift for friends or family. Isn’t it time to pamper yourself with one of these fabulous cashmere hoodies? This hoodie is the perfect way to spoil yourself. Please be aware that you should not clean cashmere in the same way you wash other clothing. The hoodie must be dry-cleaned or hand-washed in cold water. When I purchase cashmere items, I take them to a professional dry cleaner to keep them clean and fresh, which makes them last longer. The color I selected was “Oatmeal,” and I was totally underwhelmed with the color I received. I expected a vibrant color, even though it was in the tan/toupe/beige family. The hoodie was going to be a staple in my wardrobe, thinking it would be a versatile piece that I would wear quite frequently. Now I use it exclusively on the weekends when running errands. When I think of cashmere, I automatically think of plush and luxury. This sweater does not reflect those standards. This hoodie does not reflect my vivacious and colorful style. This price should reflect a high-end piece of my wardrobe, something I would find in Nordstrom; instead, it feels like a plain sweatshirt you would pick up at Target, Kohl’s, or Old Navy. Read more
items.author: Shelly Itkin / Shelly Loves to Read

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but beautiful.
items.body: This sweater is gorgeous. The fabric is very well made. Read more
items.author: Tuxie's Mom

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Oatmeal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
